topics.body:
So I finally got stalker call of pripyat and I have to say while the story is lackluster the gameplay is freaking good.

Storywise:
Fallout > STALKER trilogy
Gameplay:
STALKER > Fallout franchise

topics.body:
So apparently Israel's current prime minister might lose his election.

I'll summarize about the current Israel politics: most people want peace treaties and such, but the government is controlled by Likud which is bad for any hope of peace; if Bibi loses then shit'll cool down finally.

topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55024bdb636872135fc80100#post_55024bdb636872135fc80100
I haven't played Metro but I read the book. I highly suggest reading it. It's very good.


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55024bec6368722ad2ee0600#post_55024bec6368722ad2ee0600
I agree with Fallout being great storywise. It's not just some post-apocalyptic setting. It's a divergent history with it's own unique blend.

Also, should I play Stalker?

"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550251336368725aa1f50600#post_550251336368725aa1f50600
[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55024bdb636872135fc80100#post_55024bdb636872135fc80100
I haven't played Metro but I read the book. I highly suggest reading it. It's very good.


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55024bec6368722ad2ee0600#post_55024bec6368722ad2ee0600
I agree with Fallout being great storywise. It's not just some post-apocalyptic setting. It's a divergent history with it's own unique blend.

Also, should I play Stalker?[/bq]
Play stalker if you want to get your ass kicked.  The main thing that isn't realistic about stalker is the healing system cause let's face it if there was no way to remove radiation and broken legs meant you couldn't walk for two months that would make a game terrible.
